title: PlotSquared禁足问题
author: 我一个网管
txt_content:
PlotSquared禁足没用，使用禁足就出现这些字player not found: Everyone
you successfully denied the player from this

replies.author: 世予予
replies.txt_content: 提示: 作者被禁止或删除 内容自动屏蔽

replies.author: 我一个网管
replies.txt_content:
世予 发表于 2019-6-29 13:12
给玩家plotme.use.deny权限和plots.deny以及plots.deny.everyone权限试试
OK了，谢谢

replies.author: saonan666
replies.txt_content: 竟然真的在这找到解决方法了0 0我试了半个多小时
